code: import axios from'axios';var URI='http://localhost:5000';export var fetchPosts=function fetchPosts(){return axios.get("".concat(URI,"/posts"));};export var createPost=function createPost(payload){return axios.post("".concat(URI,"/posts"),payload);};export var updatePost=function updatePost(payload){return axios.post("".concat(URI,"/posts/update"),payload);};
